Intro.introductionStatement: Results-driven developer with 4 years of experience architecting and implementing scalable, user-centric web applications at Deloitte. Demonstrates expertise in React, JavaScript, and modern frontend frameworks, with a consistent track record of delivering high-impact solutions on mission-critical projects. Recognized for technical leadership, accessibility compliance, and outstanding teamwork through multiple Deloitte SPOT and APPLAUSE awards. Proven ability to resolve complex UI/UX challenges, optimize performance, and mentor team members in fast-paced environments. Seeking to leverage deep React knowledge and a passion for innovation to contribute to ambitious product teams.

Experiences.Description: NextGen Verification Hub is a comprehensive eligibility verification system with dedicated Admin console and Customer Portal interfaces for managing benefits verification processes.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• Independently delivered Admin console screens, establishing base project structure and coding standards from scratch.
  • Developed more than 30 individual screens for Customer and Admin Portals with exceptional accuracy and attention to detail.
  • Led major UI cleanup and component updates to align with latest FIGMA designs, boosting maintainability and visual consistency across Customer & Admin Portals.
  • Designed database tables for new interface integrations and spearheaded AVS Interface backend work.
  • Resolved 20+ defects, strengthening system reliability, and performed thorough performance and file upload testing across customer flows.
  • Recognition: Praised for independence, mentorship, and accelerated delivery during critical phases.
Experiences.Tools Used: React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL, FIGMA, Visual Studio Code, SourceTree, Postman, JIRA

Experiences.Description: SCCP LIFT Customer Portal enabling citizens to apply for and manage social service benefits with integrated appeals functionality.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• Provided architectural guidance and rapid solutions for South Carolina SSP LIFT Functional Flows, including urgent delivery of demo login screens.
  • Transformed legacy class components to functional React components to improve scalability and maintainability.
  • Delivered over 10 UI screens with backend integrations, and completed Spanish translations for 20+ screens.
  • Closed 5+ backlog items and resolved team-critical bugs, supporting a successful and timely Appeals module launch.
  • Created unit tests and maintained thorough documentation for deliverables.
  • Awards: SCCP SPOT AWARD, APPLAUSE AWARD for outstanding module delivery and adaptability.
Experiences.Tools Used: React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, i18next, PostgreSQL, FIGMA, Visual Studio Code, Git, Postman, JIRA

Experiences.Description: Michigan SSP focused on enhancing mobile responsiveness and accessibility compliance for state benefits portal.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• Fixed 80+ mobile responsiveness defects and delivered 99% closure of 60+ ADA accessibility issues.
  • Optimized React UI by removing redundant DOM structures, improving page load speed by 30%, and fixing 60+ lint errors.
  • Awards: APPLAUSE AWARD for technical excellence and support to SC/MI teams.
Experiences.Tools Used: React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, AXE DevTools, NVDA, JAWS, Chrome DevTools, Visual Studio Code, JIRA

Experiences.Description: FL ACCESS comprehensive platform facilitating access to social services including CalFresh, Medi-Cal, CalWORKs, enabling users to apply, renew benefits, and manage case information.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• Delivered 40+ user stories, fixed 15+ critical bugs, and ensured accessibility compliance (ADA, NVDA, AXE).
  • Contributed to major module (RMB & RAC) stabilizationâ€”managed SIT readiness and closed 40+ validation tickets.
  • Facilitated onboarding by mentoring and providing knowledge-transfer sessions to new developers.
  • Recognition: Deloitte SPOT and APPLAUSE awards for key contributions to demos, accessibility, and quality delivery.
Experiences.Tools Used: React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL, AXE DevTools, NVDA, FIGMA, Visual Studio Code, SourceTree, Postman, Lambda Test

Experiences.Description: Additional significant projects demonstrating versatility across multiple state implementations and healthcare platforms.
Experiences.Responsibilities:
• NextGen RFI & LIFT Enhancement (Feb 2024 - Dec 2024): Implemented state-specific enhancements across multiple SSP implementations and resolved numerous LIFT-related defects.
  • HealthChoice (Sep 2021 - Jul 2022): Developed compliant UI screens using React.js, reducing load times by 25%, and implemented responsive design for multi-device use.
  • Demonstrated strong problem-solving and adaptability in dynamic, cross-state environments while maintaining consistent code quality and documentation standards.
Experiences.Tools Used: React, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL, Redux, Visual Studio Code, SourceTree, JIRA, FIGMA, DBeaver, SoapUI

Achievements.title: Deloitte APPLAUSE Award (Michigan & SCCP)
Achievements.description: Received APPLAUSE AWARD for exceptional teamwork and technical support across Michigan and SC-CP project teams, demonstrating adaptability and technical excellence.

Achievements.title: SC-CP SPOT Award
Achievements.description: Awarded SCCP SPOT AWARD for adaptability in SSP framework and rapid, high-quality UI delivery for the Appeals module, showcasing excellent problem-solving skills.

Achievements.title: Deloitte APPLAUSE Award (FL Access)
Achievements.description: Received Deloitte APPLAUSE award for playing a pivotal role in achieving critical FL SSP project milestones with leadership and dedication noted by management.

Achievements.title: Deloitte SPOT Award (FL Access Demo)
Achievements.description: Received Deloitte SPOT award for outstanding contribution to the successful FL Access project demo, demonstrating exceptional presentation and technical skills.

Achievements.title: Deloitte SPOT Award (Demo Project)
Achievements.description: Awarded Deloitte SPOT award for developing a demo project with a user-friendly interface that contributed to the product's successful sales and client acquisition.

Projects.Name: OtakuFlix
Projects.description: A modern, responsive anime streaming platform built with React. Real-time API-powered React anime discovery platform featuring live data from MyAnimeList, smart watchlist management, and responsive design. Built with React 18, real-time API integration, genre filtering, rating stats, and seamless anime browsing experience with trailer support and mobile-optimized interface.

Projects.Name: PawPals
Projects.description: Pet Store website crafted with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JS, offering a visually appealing and user-friendly platform for pet enthusiasts.
